wikipedia_page.main: Hazel Marion Radclyffe Dolling (née Staples; 13 June 1923–24 April 2006) was the châtelaine of Lissan House, a stately home near Cookstown, Northern Ireland. Lissan is set at the foot of the Sperrin Mountains. Dolling was the last surviving member of the Staples family.

response: *Hazel Dolling (1923–2006), châtelaine of Lissan House, Northern Ireland
